entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
